data.name: iStripper
data.detailed_description:
iStripper is the only software in the World that brings stunning sexy girls to live & undress directly onto your computer taskbar.

Free and entertaining use:


Display up to 10 girls simultaneously on your computer screen. They walk, dance, send kisses, do swing, etc. without any nudity. Catch the girls, move them wherever you want on your screen, including on your file window. Click on a girl to bring her in a full screen size, display her in a strip club environment, etc. This use is totally free and you can download 1500+ show previews from our catalog of models.

Spice up your desktop!


Wanna something more hot and intense ?

You will get 50 credits when you buy iStripper. Use these credits to get the full nude show of the model of your choice. The girl will come and strip naked on your taskbar to turn you on for over 30 minutes and make you feel like in a real strip club. And you can watch it as often as you want. You can buy more credits with in-app purchase options.

Addictive!


Our fans can collect thousands shows and play them as often as they like. At each step of their collection process, they get rewarded with trophies, special discounts and bonuses.

Also included: Sexy screensavers


Enjoy all your girls in full screen thanks to the fully featured screensaver. Pick up the girls of your choice from your collection, choose the decorum you want (strip bar, Caribbean garden, etc.), select the special effects and let the show begin!

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.7 or above
  • Processor: Dual core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11 or above
  • Processor: Dual core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 50 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics

content_descriptors.notes:
This application features beautiful babes pole-dancing, teasing and stripping naked on your computer taskbar, solo and sometimes in duo. They have a seductive and explicit behavior that includes intimate caresses on breasts, bottom and intimate areas, with or without sextoys.

To sum up, that's just elegant eroticism for educated grown ups.
